note.p: Daughter of Rosa and John Bullar of Bassett Wood, Southampton. After her uncle Joseph Bullar’s death in 1869, awarded probate on his estate in 1871.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/1201/69/19)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 November 2019)
